metadata.name: In Perpetuity
metadata.description:
"In Perpetuity" is a piece created in honor of the Joyn community, a collaborative effort between Hiena and Joyn. It serves as a reminder of the often solitary path of creatives, and encourages us to cherish those around us while never forgetting the journey we took to get to where we are today.  
It was a privilege to work on this piece, and I want to thank the winners for their participation. You are the ones who make the space and the community possible.
